titleStmt.title: Two treatises The first, concerning reproaching & censure: the second, an answer to Mr Serjeant's Sure-footing. To which are annexed three sermons preached upon several occasions, and very useful for these times. By the late learned and reverend William Falkner, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Falkner, William, d. 1682.
Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
Sturt, John, 1658-1730, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Chiswell, at the Rose and Crown in S. Paul's Church-Yard, and sold by William Oliver, in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Sergeant, John. Sure-footing in Christianity.
Frontis. portrait (A1v) of author signed: I. Sturt. sc:
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2429 lacking first leaf with portrait.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
